ar: قُلْ يَـٰعِبَادِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا ٱتَّقُوا رَبَّكُمْ ۚ
en: Say, "O My servants who have believed, fear your Lord.

ar: لِلَّذِينَ أَحْسَنُوا فِى هَـٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةٌ ۗ
en: For those who do good in this world is good,
and the earth of Allah is spacious.
Indeed, the patient will be given their reward
without account [i.e., limit]."

ar: قُلْ إِنِّىٓ أُمِرْتُ أَنْ أَعْبُدَ ٱللَّهَ
en: Say, [O Muhammad], "Indeed, I have been commanded to worship Allah,
[being] sincere to Him in religion.
And I have been commanded to be the first [among you] of the Muslims."

ar: قُلْ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ إِنْ عَصَيْتُ رَبِّى
en: Say, "Indeed I fear, if I should disobey my Lord,
the punishment of a tremendous Day."

ar: قُلِ ٱللَّهَ أَعْبُدُ مُخْلِصًا لَّهُۥ دِينِى
en: Say, "Allah [alone] do I worship, sincere to Him in my religion,
So worship what you will besides Him."
Say, "Indeed, the losers are the ones who will lose
the ones who will lose themselves
and their families on the Day of Resurrection.
Unquestionably, that is the loss."
Unquestionably, that is the manifest loss."

ar: لَهُم مِّن فَوْقِهِمْ ظُلَلٌ مِّنَ ٱلنَّارِ
en: They will have canopies [i.e., layers] of fire above them

ar: لَهُم مِّن فَوْقِهِمْ ظُلَلٌ مِّنَ ٱلنَّارِ
en: They will have canopies [i.e., layers] of fire above them

ar: لَهُم مِّن فَوْقِهِمْ ظُلَلٌ مِّنَ ٱلنَّارِ
en: They will have canopies [i.e., layers] of fire above them
and below them, canopies.
By that Allah threatens [i.e., warns] His servants.
By that Allah threatens [i.e., warns] His servants.
By that Allah threatens [i.e., warns] His servants.
O My servants, then fear Me.
